content: angela makes vanilla shorties by angela allen #amvshorties the angela makes vanilla amv shorties are a free vanilla shortie sock pattern it is accompanied by a video tutorial with the aim of showing you how i knit socks i really struggled when i started knitting socks and watched many video tutorials i am hoping this will help at least one of you who are starting out or restarting your sock knitting journey this can also be extended to a full sock if this is what you prefer to wear just remember you will need more than the recommended sock yarn instructions are included for three different sizes note it is useful to read through all instructions before starting to knit 1 gauge using the recommended yarn and needles 32sts and 38 row of stockinette in the round per 4in 10cm this gauge is after blocking sizing the sizes are approximate the pattern is knit with 0 75 negative ease to fit foot circumference small 7 medium 8 large 9 materials the materials below are those used for the sample in the photo these socks were a medium uk5 eu38 so if you are knitting socks for a larger foot or the large size you will need a little extra yarn i have been generous with the amount of yarn presented below yarn used in sample mc yarn is rico alpaca art sock yarn 400m/100g 55% wool 25% polyamide 25% alpaca all other yarn is sock/4ply yarn 425m / 100g 75% merino 25% nylon medium cuff yarn 6g 8 mc 25g heel yarn 8g toe yarn 8g suggested needles 9 24cm circular knitting needles in 2 25mm or size required to obtain gauge also 2 25mm dpns for the heel and a longer 100cm 2 25mm circular needle to work magic loop on the toe or you can use double pointed needles dpns if you prefer notions stitch markers optional scissors and tapestry needle abbreviations k knit m marker p purl pm place marker k2tog knit the next 2 stitches together sm slip marker p2tog purl the next 2 stitches together tbl through back loop of stitch ssk slip first stitch as if to knit slip second mc main colour stitch as if to knit knit both of these stitches together through the back of loop st s stitch es bor beginning of round sl slip stich purlwise rs right side of work s1wyib slip 1 stitch purlwise with yarn in back ws wrong side of work 2 instructions cast on using cuff yarn cast on 57 66 72 sts using the german twisted cast on this will give you a stretchier cast on edge to get sock more easily over your foot add a stitch marker and join the work in the round note as i use 9 circulars i tend to work the first row straight and then join in the round as i find it easier to join 2 x 1 rib cuff
